attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current:
I can stare down a hell hound without flinching.

I enjoy being strong and like breaking things.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: Might. In life as in war, the stronger force wins. (Evil)

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: I'll never forget the crushing defeat my company suffered or the enemies who dealt it.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: My hatred of my enemies is blind and unreasoning.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MVxmGgtbw9l0NxSoFwK_description
attribs.current: You have a limited well of stamina that you can draw on to protect yourself from harm. On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MVxmGgvSiX4eGdfnN1v_description
attribs.current: When a creature you can see attacks a target other than you that is within 5 feet of you, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll. You must be wielding a shield.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MVxmGgvSiX4eGdfnN1y_description
attribs.current: You have resistance to acid damage.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MVxmGgvSiX4eGdfnN1z_description
attribs.current:
You can use your action to exhale destructive energy. Your black draconic ancestry means this exhalation is a 5 by 30 ft. line dealing acid damage.
When you use your breath weapon, each creature in the area of the exhalation must make a Dexterity saving throw. The DC for this saving throw equals 8 + your Constitution modifier + your proficiency bonus. A creature takes 2d6 damage on a failed save, and half as much on a successful one. The damage increases to 3d6 at 6th level, 4d6 at 11th level, and 5d6 at 16th level.
After you use your breath weapon, you can't use it again until you complete a short or long rest.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MVxmGgwT7-udie1Uj3I_description
attribs.current: You know the mercenary life as only someone who has experienced it can. You are able to identify mercenary companies by their emblems, and you know a little about any such company, including the names and reputations of its commanders and leaders, and who has hired them recently. You can find the taverns and festhalls where mercenaries abide in any area, as long as you speak the language. You can find mercenary work between adventures sufficient to maintain a comfortable lifestyle (see “Practicing a Profession” under “Downtime Activities” in chapter 8 of the Player’s Handbook).

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVxmGgyrwfIukKssIJf_itemcontent
attribs.current: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVxmGgyrwfIukKssIJg_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Bludgeoning

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVxmGgyrwfIukKssIJh_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

If you use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a melee attack, you treat the weapon as an improvised weapon (see "Improvised Weapons" later in the section). A sling must be loaded to deal any damage when used in this way.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVxmGgyrwfIukKssIJh_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Ranged Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 80/320,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVxmGgyrwfIukKssIJi_itemcontent
attribs.current: Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVxmGgyrwfIukKssIJj_itemcontent
attribs.current: A cloth or leather pouch can hold up to 20 sling bullets or 50 blowgun needles, among other things. A compartmentalized pouch for holding spell components is called a component pouch. A pouch can hold up to 1/5 cubic foot or 6 pounds of gear.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVxmGgzTVq30reFe4kV_itemcontent
attribs.current: A backpack can hold one cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear. You can also strap items, such as a bedroll or a coil of rope, to the outside of a backpack.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVxmGgzTVq30reFe4kW_itemcontent
attribs.current: Using a crowbar grants advantage to Strength checks where the crowbar's leverage can be applied.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVxmGgzTVq30reFe4kZ_itemcontent
attribs.current: This small container holds flint, fire steel, and tinder (usually dry cloth soaked in light oil) used to kindle a fire. Using it to light a torch - or anything else with abundant, exposed fuel - takes an action. Lighting any other fire takes 1 minute.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVxmGh-PM9jlmdCIZol_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rations consist of dry foods suitable for extended travel, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVxmGh-PM9jlmdCIZom_itemcontent
attribs.current: A waterskin can hold up to 4 pints of liquid.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVxmGh-PM9jlmdCIZon_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rope, whether made of hemp or silk, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MVxmQzYgdRRJ9a4SwoJ_description
attribs.current:
Starting at 2nd level, you can push yourself beyond your normal limits for a moment. On your turn, you can take one additional action on top of your regular action and a possible bonus action.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MVxnR8sgUrbsb1ijZ1o_description
attribs.current: Beginning when you choose this archetype at 3rd level, your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MVxnfLOffh2gFXTZoZs_description
attribs.current:
Whenever you reach a level in this class that grants the Ability Score Improvement feature, you can do one of the following, as you shift the focus of your martial practice.
 Replace a fighting style you know with another fighting style available to fighters.If you know any maneuvers from the Battle Master archetype, you can replace one maneuver you know with a different maneuver.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MVxnlIL9-yfbZxzKbl2_description
attribs.current: Beginning at 5th level, you can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVxo3z15r0Fxe8NTkdR_itemcontent
attribs.current: Plate consists of shaped, interlocking metal plates to cover the entire body. A suit of plate includes gauntlets, heavy leather boots, a visored helmet, and thick layers of padding underneath the armor. Buckles and straps distribute the weight over the body.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVxoK-E6ZSZ8sZpxsgb_itemcontent
attribs.current: Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows. The suit includes gauntlets.
